appendix.title: Known Bugs
appendix.para: The following is a list of bugs that may or may not be fixed. If you have any questions about what still needs to be done to Netxx, please take a look at the TODO file.

listitem.para: The Netxx::Address class uses gethostbyname and on most unix-like operating systems that function is NOT thread safe. I am currently looking at ways to get around this. I know that some systems supply gethostbyname_r but not all do.
Of course there is no support for local domain sockets on Win32. At some point I will add code for doing windows pipes to simulate local domain sockets.
TLS Support is NOT thread safe. This will be fixed.
